tool.name: OpenSwathDIAPreScoring
tool.description: Scoring spectra using the DIA scores.
tool.command:
OpenSwathDIAPreScoring
#if $param_tr: -tr $param_tr #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if -swath_files #for token in $param_swath_files: $token #end for #if $param_min_upper_edge_dist: -min_upper_edge_dist $param_min_upper_edge_dist #end if -threads \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-24} #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #end if

param.name: param_swath_files
param.label: Swath files that were used to extract the transitions
param.help: (-swath_files) If present, SWATH specific scoring will be applied

param.name: param_min_upper_edge_dist
param.label: Minimal distance to the edge to still consider a precursor, in Thomson (only in SWATH)

tool.help:
**What it does**
Scoring spectra using the DIA scores.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_OpenSwathDIAPreScoring.html
